content:
How is Core.checkInterrupted related to IO.checkCancelled?

There doesn't seem to be any connection but they serve similar purposes

The former is for when you are writing a meta program and want to check whether you got interrupted while doing so, for example because another edit was done to the file. IO.checkCancelled is for when you are running a task and you want to figure out whether that task got cancelled.
Leni Aniva has marked this topic as resolved.
